motd: Bugfix: Ionian Insight now grants the proper, 10 summoner spell haste instead of 0.1.

passive_2: Healing, shielding or buffing an ally, damaging abilities against champions, and using summoner spells grants you [10%|8%] bonus movement speed for 4 seconds. This can be triggered from the same cast instance only once every 4 seconds.
passive_3: Requires *Blessing of Noxus* and two Legendary-tier items equipped.
